===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to [[know]] (a person)
#: {{zh-x|我 識得 佢。|I '''know''' him.|C-GZ}}
# to be [[able]]; to know how
#: {{zh-x|我 識得 游水。|I '''can''' swim.|C-GZ}}
#: {{zh-x|我 識得 講 英文{man4-2} 㗎。|I '''can''' speak English.|C-GZ}}
#: {{zh-x|佢 識得 話 人 唔 識得 話 自己。|He has no problem pointing out others' faults, but he can't find his own faults.|C-GZ}}
